pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prevalence to Incidence Calculations for Point-Prevalence Studies in a Nosocomial Setting // Functions to simulate point prevalence studies (PPSs) of healthcare-associated infections (HAIs) and to convert prevalence to incidence in steady state setups. Companion package to the preprint Willrich et al., From prevalence to incidence - a new approach in the hospital setting; doi:10.1101/554725 , where methods are explained in detail.
